Plot: A news team trails a man as he travels into the world of Eden Parish to find his missing sister, where it becomes apparent that this paradise may not be as it seems.
Title: The Sacrament
Actors: Joe Swanberg, AJ Bowen, Kentucker Audley, Gene Jones
tomatoConsensus: While it may be a bit too slow for some, The Sacrament offers enough tense atmosphere and intriguing ideas to satisfy discerning horror buffs.
